name: Adobe Character Animator Puppet Maker Template
summary: Learn about .MAKER files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Character Animator is an Adobe Creative Cloud (CC) application for animating characters based on your movements and voice. MAKER templates are packaged with the software. You can find MAKER template files in the following location in macOS:
Macintosh HD/​Applications/​Adobe Character Animator [version]/​Adobe Character Animator [version]/​Contents/​Resources/​puppetmaker
In Character Animator, you can view puppet templates by selecting File → Open Puppet Maker....

instructions: You can only open a MAKER file with Adobe Character Animator in Windows and macOS. To open a MAKER file, select File → Import....
Character Animator can convert MAKER files to several file types, including the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
